[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1675841696870{border-top-width: 10px !important;border-right-width: 10px !important;border-bottom-width: 10px !important;border-left-width: 10px !important;}”][vc_column][ucaddon_centered_banner title=”MUFASA TOURS AND TRAVELS, KENYA” range=”ABOUT US” link=”#” image=”5845″ button_bg=”” hover_bg=”” btn_txt_hover_color=”” uc_fonts_data=”JTdCJTIydGl0bGUlMjIlM0ElN0IlMjJmb250LWZhbWlseSUyMiUzQSUyMk9wZW4lMjBTYW5zJTIyJTJDJTIyZm9udC1zaXplJTIyJTNBJTIyNDBweCUyMiU3RCU3RA==”][/ucaddon_centered_banner][vc_empty_space height=”30px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1675841099391{border-top-width: 10px !important;border-right-width: 10px !important;border-bottom-width: 10px !important;border-left-width: 10px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_headings style=”theme3″ linewidth=”100″ borderwidth=”3″ borderclr=”#78281f” title=”About Us” google_fonts=”font_family:Open%20Sans%3A300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C600%2C600italic%2C700%2C700italic%2C800%2C800italic|font_style:600%20bold%20regular%3A600%3Anormal” lineheight=”2″ titlesize=”24″ titleclr=”#78281f”][/vc_headings][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1677587116303{border-top-width: 10px !important;border-right-width: 10px !important;border-bottom-width: 10px !important;border-left-width: 10px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_headings style=”theme3″ linewidth=”100″ borderwidth=”3″ borderclr=”#78281f” title=”Who We Are” google_fonts=”font_family:Open%20Sans%3A300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C600%2C600italic%2C700%2C700italic%2C800%2C800italic|font_style:600%20bold%20regular%3A600%3Anormal” lineheight=”2″ titlesize=”24″ titleclr=”#78281f”][/vc_headings][vc_separator border_width=”6″][vc_column_text]

Our East African Tour Operator is dedicated to providing exceptional travel experiences through tailor-made and socially responsible safaris and beach holidays that leave a lasting impression. Since 1999, we have delivered a high-quality, unique service that offers true value for money. Whether you’re looking for Budget Safaris, Mid-range Safaris & Luxury Safaris, Wildlife Photographic Safaris, Bird watching Safaris, beach vacations, city excursions, hotel bookings or airport transfers, we’ve got you covered. We aim to create unforgettable memories for you, and our knowledgeable and responsive staff is always ready to help you discover the best of East Africa. For 24-hour customer service and to book your adventure, contact us today.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”9243″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” css=”.vc_custom_1677590161199{border-top-width: 10px !important;border-right-width: 10px !important;border-bottom-width: 10px !important;border-left-width: 10px !important;}”][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1677593979487{background-image: url(https://mufasatoursandtravels.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/02/about-mufasa.jpg?id=9251) !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1677594014136{margin-top: 70px !important;margin-bottom: 70px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

“Think Travel, Think Mufasa”

We’re not just a travel agency – we’re memory-makers. With our tailor-made and socially responsible safaris and beach holidays, you’ll experience East Africa in a way that will leave you with unforgettable moments.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1675775756820{border-top-width: 10px !important;border-right-width: 10px !important;border-bottom-width: 10px !important;border-left-width: 10px !important;}”][vc_column el_id=”why”][vc_headings style=”theme3″ linewidth=”100″ borderwidth=”3″ borderclr=”#78281f” title=”Why Choose Us” google_fonts=”font_family:Open%20Sans%3A300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C600%2C600italic%2C700%2C700italic%2C800%2C800italic|font_style:600%20bold%20regular%3A600%3Anormal” transform=”normal” titleclr=”#78281f”][/vc_headings][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1675775855744{border-top-width: 10px !important;border-right-width: 10px !important;border-bottom-width: 10px !important;border-left-width: 10px !important;}”][vc_column][ucaddon_uc_clean_carousel uc_items_data=”” uc_fonts_data=””][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content”][vc_column el_id=”reviews”][vc_headings style=”theme3″ linewidth=”100″ borderwidth=”3″ borderclr=”#000000″ title=”Traveller Reviews” use_theme_fonts=”yes” transform=”uppercase” titleclr=”#9b1815″][/vc_headings][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1677682225945{background-image: url(https://mufasatoursandtravels.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/mufasa-tours-and-travel2.jpg?id=9308) !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1677594014136{margin-top: 70px !important;margin-bottom: 70px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

We are passionate about crafting personalized, seamless travel experiences that cater to your unique interests and preferences. Our team of expert travel planners and guides is dedicated to taking care of every detail, from recommending the best accommodations and activities to ensuring your safety and comfort throughout your journey. With us, you’ll have access to exclusive tours, hidden gems, and insider knowledge that will elevate your travel experience beyond your wildest dreams. So why wait? Let’s plan your next adventure today and realize your travel dreams!

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1675775682252{border-top-width: 10px !important;border-right-width: 10px !important;border-bottom-width: 10px !important;border-left-width: 10px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_headings style=”theme3″ linewidth=”100″ borderwidth=”3″ borderclr=”#000000″ title=”Our Accreditations and Booking Security” use_theme_fonts=”yes” transform=”uppercase” titleclr=”#9b1815″][/vc_headings][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_column_text]

People who always support and endorse our good work

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1675775742486{border-top-width: 10px !important;border-right-width: 10px !important;border-bottom-width: 10px !important;border-left-width: 10px !important;}”][vc_column]
[vc_empty_space height=”15px”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
